stages.name: grpcreate
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper grpcreate.log 'o2-grp-simgrp-tool createGRPs --timestamp 1546300800000 --run 300000 --publishto ${ALICEO2_CCDB_LOCALCACHE:-.ccdb} -o grp --hbfpertf 32 --field -5 --detectorList ALICE2 --readoutDets all --print --vertex Diamond --configKeyValues "Diamond.width[2]=6."'

stages.name: precollcontext
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper precollcontext.log '${O2_ROOT}/bin/o2-steer-colcontexttool -i sgn,500000,1000000:1000000 --show-context --timeframeID 0 --orbitsPerTF 32 --orbits 160 --seed 1234 --noEmptyTF --first-orbit 256 --extract-per-timeframe tf:sgn --with-vertices kCCDB --maxCollsPerTF 500 --orbitsEarly 1 --timestamp 1546300800000 --bcPatternFile ccdb'

stages.name: sim_alignment
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper sim_alignment.log '${O2_ROOT}/bin/o2-ccdb-downloadccdbfile --host http://alice-ccdb.cern.ch -p MID/MisCalib/Align --timestamp 1546300800000 --created-not-after 3385078236000 -d ${ALICEO2_CCDB_LOCALCACHE}/MID/Calib/Align --no-preserve-path ; ${O2_ROOT}/bin/o2-ccdb-downloadccdbfile --host http://alice-ccdb.cern.ch -p MCH/MisCalib/Align --timestamp 1546300800000 --created-not-after 3385078236000 -d ${ALICEO2_CCDB_LOCALCACHE}/MCH/Calib/Align --no-preserve-path '

stages.name: sgngen_1
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper sgngen_1.log '${O2_ROOT}/bin/o2-sim --noGeant -j 1 --field ccdb --vertexMode kCollContext --run 300000 --configKeyValues "MFTBase.buildAlignment=true;Diamond.width[2]=6.;" -g external --configFile /storage3/liveraro/ALICE_PhotonReconstruction/itstpcstudy_new/configK0gun.ini -o genevents --timestamp 1546300800000 --seed 266679459 -n 500 --detectorList ALICE2 --fromCollContext collisioncontext.root:sgn'

stages.name: sgnsim_1
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper sgnsim_1.log '${O2_ROOT}/bin/o2-sim -e TGeant3 --skipModules ZDC -n 500 --seed 266679459 --field ccdb -j 4 --configKeyValues "MFTBase.buildAlignment=true;Diamond.width[2]=6.;" --configFile /storage3/liveraro/ALICE_PhotonReconstruction/itstpcstudy_new/configK0gun.ini -o sgn --detectorList ALICE2 --timestamp 1546300800000 --run 300000 -g extkinO2 --extKinFile genevents_Kine.root --vertexMode kNoVertex --fromCollContext collisioncontext.root'

stages.name: linkGRP_1
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper linkGRP_1.log 'ln -nsf sgn_grp.root o2sim_grp.root ; ln -nsf sgn_geometry.root o2sim_geometry.root; ln -nsf sgn_geometry-aligned.root o2sim_geometry-aligned.root'

stages.name: tpcdigi_1
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper tpcdigi_1.log '${O2_ROOT}/bin/o2-ccdb-downloadccdbfile --host http://alice-ccdb.cern.ch -p TPC/Config/RunInfoV2 --timestamp 1546300800000 --created-not-after 3385078236000 -d ${ALICEO2_CCDB_LOCALCACHE} ; ${O2_ROOT}/bin/o2-sim-digitizer-workflow -b --run --condition-not-after 3385078236000 --shm-segment-size ${SHMSIZE:-50000000000} -n 500 --sims sgn --onlyDet TPC --TPCuseCCDB --interactionRate 500000 --tpc-lanes 4 --incontext collisioncontext.root --disable-write-ini --early-forward-policy always --forceSelectedDets --tpc-distortion-type 0 --n-threads-distortions 1 --configKeyValues "HBFUtils.orbitFirstSampled=256;HBFUtils.nHBFPerTF=32;HBFUtils.orbitFirst=256;HBFUtils.runNumber=300000;HBFUtils.startTime=1546300800000;DigiParams.maxOrbitsToDigitize=32;DigiParams.seed=266679459;TPCEleParam.DigiMode=2" --tpc-chunked-writer'

stages.name: aod_1
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper aod_1.log '[ -f AO2D.root ] && rm AO2D.root; ${O2_ROOT}/bin/o2-aod-producer-workflow --reco-mctracks-only 1 --aod-writer-keep dangling --aod-writer-resfile AO2D --aod-writer-resmode "UPDATE" --run-number 300000 -b --run --condition-not-after 3385078236000 --shm-segment-size ${SHMSIZE:-50000000000} --info-sources ITS-TPC,TPC-TRD,ITS-TPC-TRD,TPC-TOF,ITS-TPC-TOF,TPC-TRD-TOF,ITS-TPC-TRD-TOF,MFT-MCH,MCH-MID,ITS,MFT,TPC,TOF,FT0,MID,EMC,PHS,CPV,FDD,HMP,FV0,TRD,MCH,CTP --lpmp-prod-tag unknown --anchor-pass ${ALIEN_JDL_LPMANCHORPASSNAME:-unknown} --anchor-prod ${ALIEN_JDL_LPMANCHORPRODUCTION:-unknown} --created-by gsetouel --combine-source-devices --aod-timeframe-id ${ALIEN_PROC_ID}001'

stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper sgngen_2.log '${O2_ROOT}/bin/o2-sim --noGeant -j 1 --field ccdb --vertexMode kCollContext --run 300000 --configKeyValues "MFTBase.buildAlignment=true;Diamond.width[2]=6.;" -g external --configFile /storage3/liveraro/ALICE_PhotonReconstruction/itstpcstudy_new/configK0gun.ini -o genevents --timestamp 1546300800000 --seed 266679460 -n 500 --detectorList ALICE2 --fromCollContext collisioncontext.root:sgn'

stages.name: aodmerge
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper aodmerge.log ' set -e ; [ -f aodmerge_input.txt ] && rm aodmerge_input.txt; for i in `seq 1 5`; do echo "tf${i}/AO2D.root" >> aodmerge_input.txt; done; o2-aod-merger --input aodmerge_input.txt --output AO2D_pre.root ; root -q -b -l "${O2DPG_ROOT}/MC/utils/AODBcRewriter.C(\"AO2D_pre.root\",\"AO2D.root\")" ; ${O2DPG_ROOT}/MC/bin/o2dpg_determine_eventstat.py'
